A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi's only accomplishment was the visual effects. The movie failed to deliver a story with substance. The stroy relied too much in deus ex machina\, ignored the rule of checkov's gun\, and crippled potentially good scenes with ill-placed bad humor. Worse yet\, it mocked the legend and mythos of Star Wars and discarded characters that needed more screen time.
